article_title: The ACA's Medical Loss Ratio Rule Kicks In; Not Much Happens

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: One much vaunted part of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (aka "Obamacare") is the idea that health insurance premiums should actually be spent on providing people with health care. A radical idea I hope we'll all agree. This is called the Medical Loss Ratio and the idea is [...]
